alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 9:34PM CST until March 07 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Lowland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CST Monday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
